name: joke
text: The joke was that the order of authors in the paper would be more important if they knew that the paper would become famous.

name: Hans-path
text: Hans run away to the West Germany when he was released from the prison where he spend fifteen months. He studied linguistics and computer science in Berlin. Eventually, Hans ended up in the US where he worked in a SRI lab on artificial intelligence. SRI is a research institute in Menlo Park, California. However, he returned to Germany, when Jakob was born. Jakob went to university in Germany.
